text: Lɨhavɨci 8.15 Lu 12.1 Jisasɨ nulɨdɨ hɨve lama abamalɨ. Namɨlaŋ Helotɨ dɨ maci hukɨla hukɨla hɨsɨŋ isɨ aba abahɨdavi agɨlasaŋ sikɨvica sɨbam migɨlɨkalaŋ uamalɨ. Falisi hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ maci hukɨla hukɨla hɨsɨŋ isɨ aba abahɨdavi agɨlasaŋ aveji sikɨvica sɨbam migɨlɨkalaŋ uamalɨ.8.15 Mafɨliŋ mafɨliŋ ciaŋ agaŋ nɨbu maci hukɨla hukɨla hɨsɨŋ isɨ uavɨdami agaŋ me.
